tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:patient complains of mild easy bruising and mild non pruritic rash and other medical problems. NKDA. patient is a 53 yr old male linguist. he admits to smoking 1 pack/day for the last 2 years he drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 64 in, Weight 170 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 66, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 40 mg daily x 4 days, and ordered CBC.

tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:a male aged 54 years presents with mild non pruritic rash and mild easy bruising for 6 weeks. he consumes 2 drinks per night he smokes 1 pack a day o:Height 63 in, Weight 166 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC.
